sourceMeaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>number</radical>ed <radical>feather</radical>. Pick your favorite number and put it on the feather. Then, put the numbered feather on your head. When you put it on, you're able to <kanji>flip</kanji> and <kanji>flip</kanji> over and over.
meaningInfo: Imagine yourself doing flips with this feather on your head. Flip flip flip.
readingMnemonic: You're pretty good at your <kanji>flip</kanji> technique, but you're not that good. You really need to practice and <reading>hone</reading> (<ja>ほん</ja>) your skills and get better.
readingInfo: Or, maybe you get so good that you write a <ja><reading>本</reading></ja> (<ja>ほん</ja>) about doing a flip. Wow, you're good!
